name: Super hero justice war league
description:
Universal Laws are broken and our planet is under attack of alien Robots. A nerve wrecking action packed experince is at the palm of your hand. Super villains have teamed up with robots.
Are you ready for an Epic battle! A mind blowing adventure is awaiting. Master the powers of superheroes and take up the challenge .Our world needs a savior of humanity and a superhero is the only hope. Remember your costume is just one click away. Select from the range of superheroes vs super villains for the injustice war. select from a variety of weapons and super power attacks.
 
The Evil Alien Army Robot force wants to enslave humans living on earth and they have hired Mafia Leaders and goons to control the cities and people. Our future is under sabotage; everything is taken over, the police, the military. it's an open world game, no rules, no laws, no limits. It’s a straight war between the true legends of good and evil villains. Avail the fantastic lifetime opportunity and serve justice.

The divine power has chosen a Superhero, a pure heart, a soul of truth to fight back. He is given the divine super electric powers. If you have the will to take the challenge then be the hero and enjoy the super powers. Don’t forget! you are assigned the task of saving the city and the planet by eliminating all the evil villains, alien robots, and mafia’s. 

Super Powers 
Fly high up to the sky so no-one can escape the Justice even with a cobra helicopter
Electromagnetic flash rope is your weapon to crawl up on walls and kill enemies
Hoverboard flies fast to chase the enemies.

Super Attacks 
“Electro magnetic fire blow” is used when faced with a boss villain and alien robots
“Laser electric flash” attack to destroy the enemy helicopter from a distance 
“Shooting Gun” attack to battle in face to face combat
Sprint to chase, Grapple to tackle and use fireball to kill gangsters 
 
Enemies
Super Villain 
Alien Army Robot
Cobra Helicopter
Mafia gangs, gangsters and shooters
